title: How the myth was made

description: Reconstructs the filming of Robert Flaherty's film "Man of Aran". Includes interviews with participants in the original project and raises questions about some scenes in the original film, which were of long discontinued activities re-enacted for the 1934 film. Suitable for upper secondary level.
